channel.title: Banner
channel.description:
[IMG width=550]http://i44.tinypic.com/30ttmis.jpg[/img]
Not going to use this for anything, just something I made in photoshop. (the text is just placeholder, it would be more centered) What do you think?

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I don’t even like this, don’t know what I was thinking when I made it.
I know I can make much better graphics.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @wildfirerev wildfirerev
item.description:
@wildfirerev wrote:

Nice border but the rest looks a bit unfinished
But good job anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @jr01136 jr01136
item.description:
@jr01136 wrote:

Very nice. I think you should put a 1px outline of black though so it stands out a little more though.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:7, topic:536666”][quote author=b00mz1029 link=topic=655478.msg4389068#msg4389068 date=1386794838]
The lighting on the right is a bit too harsh
[/quote]
I think it would look better if the other text layer (the transparent text) was a bit closer to the main text. There are far too many ‘water droplets’ on the blue. The leafs in the top right corner should have a small drop shadow, so that it actually shows the depth. I think the border around the text should either be a bit transparent, or under the blue. It looks odd to me. Or cut all the effects off after the border. I don’t like the selection of font you chose. I don’t like the light gray on the perimeter of the image, I personally think it should have stayed black.

Looks good though, nice job.[/quote]
I know this already (came to me when I took a second look at the image). The border imo ugly.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

b00mz1029:

The lighting on the right is a bit too harsh

I think it would look better if the other text layer (the transparent text) was a bit closer to the main text. There are far too many ‘water droplets’ on the blue. The leafs in the top right corner should have a small drop shadow, so that it actually shows the depth. I think the border around the text should either be a bit transparent, or under the blue. It looks odd to me. Or cut all the effects off after the border. I don’t like the selection of font you chose. I don’t like the light gray on the perimeter of the image, I personally think it should have stayed black.

Looks good though, nice job.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @AliAbid AliAbid
item.description:
@AliAbid wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:3, topic:536666”][quote author=AliAbid link=topic=655478.msg4388333#msg4388333 date=1386523418]
Beautiful :3

Can i have one?
[/quote]
I spent around 30 mins doing this using only a leaf and personally I think it looks bad taking a second look.

If I get time spare I guess I could make you one.[/quote]

Thanks dude!
